Package at.ac.tuwien.infosys.g2021.daemon

This package contains the implementation of the buffer daemon.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Component
    A component is a main part of the buffer daemon.
    HardwareDriverInterface
    Every driver for hardware devices must implement this interface.
    ValueChangeConsumer
    A value change consumer is an interface, which is notified about changed values.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractComponent
    This is a dummy implementation of the Component interface for convenience.
    ActorGatherer
    This is a gatherer, that communicate with the driver to control an actor.
    Adapter
    An adapter is an object, that transforms a value to another.
    AdapterChain
    This is just a chain of adapters.
    Buffer
    A buffer contains the current value of single a gatherer converted meaningful value and the according metadata, which explains the meaning of the buffer value.
    Buffers
    The set of all known buffers.
    Daemon
    This is the main class of the G2021 buffer daemon.
    Driver
    Here is the logical driver for the G2021.
    DummyAdapter
    This Adapter does no conversion.
    DummyGatherer
    This is a dummy gatherer.
    DummyHardwareDriverImplementation
    This is a dummy implementation.
    FilteringAdapter
    A filtering adapter suppresses marginal input value changes.
    Gatherer
    A gatherer represents a single value of a hardware interface.
    Gatherers
    This is a container, containing all gatherers currently working.
    HardwareDriverFactory
    This class knows all implemented hardware drivers and returns the best choice for the current hardware.
    LastChanceExceptionHandler
    This object handles uncaught exceptions.
    LowpassAdapter
    A lowpass adapter acts as lowpass filter.
    PortDescription
    The description of a hardware port.
    ScalingAdapter
    A scaling adapter calculates an output value y based on the current input value x using the equation: y = a * x**2 + b * x + c The factors a, b and c are found in the configuration.
    SensorGatherer
    This is a gatherer, that communicate with the driver to read values from a sensor.
    TestGatherer
    This is a test gatherer.
    TriggeringAdapter
    A triggering adapter toggle between the two output values "lowerOutput" and "upperOutput".
    ValueChangeProducer
    This is an abstract class, which can notify ValueChangeConsumers about value changes.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    PortClass
    The different supported classes of hardware ports.

Package at.ac.tuwien.infosys.g2021.daemon Description

This package contains the implementation of the buffer daemon.
